external.gw.api.contact

Interface ExternalContactSource

  • Deprecated. 
    External entities are deprecated. Please use the new Java API instead.

    @Deprecated
public interface ExternalContactSource
    PCF interface to an external Contact source.

    An external contact source can be either the Address Book or a ContactSearchAdapter.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Contact createLocal(Contact addressbookContact)
      Deprecated. 
      Creates a local copy of the given addressbookContact.
      void delete(Contact contact)
      Deprecated. 
      Deletes the given contact from the external source.

      Deprecated. 
      Indicates whether the given contact is new with respect to the external contact source.
      Contact loadContact(Contact contact, boolean onlyPrimaryRelationships)
      Deprecated. 
      Loads the given partially populated Contact into the current edit context, with a flag to indicate whether to load all related contacts or just primary relationships.
      Contact newContact(gw.pl.external.Type newContactType)
      Deprecated. 
      Creates a new contact in the current edit context.
      void populateRelatedContacts(Contact contact)
      Deprecated. 
      Loads the remaining related contacts into the provided contact, which must be in the current edit context.
      boolean supportsDelete()
      Deprecated. 
      Indicates whether this external contact source supports deletes.

      Deprecated. 
      Indicates whether this external contact source supports linking.

      Deprecated. 
      Indicates whether this external contact source supports updates.
      ExternalContact wrap(Contact contact)
      Deprecated. 
      Wraps the given partially populated Contact in an ExternalContact, for use with Address Book pages.

    • Method Detail

      • createLocal

        Contact createLocal(Contact addressbookContact)
        Deprecated. 
        Creates a local copy of the given addressbookContact. This is used when picking a addressbookContact from the addressbook or the IContactSearchAdapter (ie. external addressbookContact search) to be added to the local object. In the case of addressbook, we use the addressbookContact.AddressBookUID to load the full addressbookContact from addressbook. In the case of IContactSearchAdapter, we just return a copy of the given addressbookContact.
        Parameters:
        addressbookContact -
        Returns:
        A fully populated Contact suitable for storing on a local object.

      • delete

        void delete(Contact contact)
        Deprecated. 
        Deletes the given contact from the external source.
        Parameters:
        contact -

      • isNewContact

        boolean isNewContact(Contact contact)
        Deprecated. 
        Indicates whether the given contact is new with respect to the external contact source.
        Parameters:
        contact -

      • loadContact

        Contact loadContact(Contact contact,
                  boolean onlyPrimaryRelationships)
        Deprecated. 
        Loads the given partially populated Contact into the current edit context, with a flag to indicate whether to load all related contacts or just primary relationships. Loading from ContactSearchAdapter does almost nothing, just returns a cloned version of the parameter.
        Parameters:
        contact - Partially populated Contact. For loading from AddressBook only the AddressBookUID needs to be populated.
        onlyPrimaryRelationships - if set, only load primary contact relationships, rather than all. Note that unlike "Syncable" this does not set fingerprints. This is ignored by ContactSearchAdapter

      • newContact

        Contact newContact(gw.pl.external.Type newContactType)
        Deprecated. 
        Creates a new contact in the current edit context.
        Parameters:
        newContactType -
        Returns:
        A new non-persistent contact in the current edit context

      • populateRelatedContacts

        void populateRelatedContacts(Contact contact)
        Deprecated. 
        Loads the remaining related contacts into the provided contact, which must be in the current edit context.
        Parameters:
        contact - (in/out) Partially populated Contact. For loading from AddressBook only the AddressBookUID needs to be populated. After this method call, this contact should be populated.

      • supportsDelete

        boolean supportsDelete()
        Deprecated. 
        Indicates whether this external contact source supports deletes.

      • supportsLinking

        boolean supportsLinking()
        Deprecated. 
        Indicates whether this external contact source supports linking.

      • supportsUpdate

        boolean supportsUpdate()
        Deprecated. 
        Indicates whether this external contact source supports updates.

      • wrap

        ExternalContact wrap(Contact contact)
        Deprecated. 
        Wraps the given partially populated Contact in an ExternalContact, for use with Address Book pages.
        Parameters:
        contact -
